Interface Subquery

All Superinterfaces:
PredicateOperand
All Known Subinterfaces:
DomainObject, QueryDefinition
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractDomainObject, EntryExpression, FetchPath, JoinPath, KeyExpression, OperatorPath, QueryDefinitionImpl, RootPath, ValueExpression
public interface Subquery
extends PredicateOperand

Instances of this interface can be used as subqueries.
